page.title: 03FARMWAYS-CONTINUED.
page.content: thirty five thousand tons.The{dryer can handle forty tons an hour.The store has a turnover of forty five thousand tons a year. The stores' annual content is approximately:{40% wheat. {30% barley. {25% oil seed rape. {5% peas. The residue from the oil seed rape is used in the production of cattle cake on site. The grain comes from a{radius of {thirty five to forty miles.}The farmers use this storage facility if they do not have sufficient storage capacity of their own. The farmers have the option to sell their grain in Farmways store directly to Farmways, or remove it from the store and use it, or sell it themselves.
